post.body: I saw 'ur' on some stores roadside sign. The whole thing was full of that nonsense. I vowed never to shop there.
I really should have had some beer with lunch too.
What are you up to?? Dentistry?
Just be sure you don't do that on the couch!
How did you know?
Nice boob shot!
I'm gonna follow you white motherfuckers home and rape me some white bitches!
Just think about how dumb the average person is, and then realize that half the world is dumber than that.
Trying not to do anything at work before the company closes down for christmas.
At old Berlin city hall
Hey! Fuck you, Claus! I never got my fucking pony!
What am I doing? I'm seriously considering quitting this job.
Not that they were my problem, mind you, but they're being MADE my problem.
12 hours later, I'm still at work. I'm really glad that serious problems I pointed out 6 months ago are being addressed finally.
I hate snow. I really, really hate snow. Fuck you, snow.
I was nearly run over by a guy on a unicycle who was talking on a cell phone. Of all the people to be keeping his concentration on what ...
It is very disturbing to me, to see young kids running around in Nirvana clothing, whose parents probably didn't even know each other wh ...
Line of the day: If you wash lousy clothing at low temperatures, all you get is cleaner lice.
at work, hung over, new manager starts today.
Jesus fuck it's snowing. I fucking hate snow.
For fucks sake, all I want to do is go to sleep and i've contracted full body hiccoughs. i haven't even had that much to drink :-(
Today was supposed to be a quiet day at work, go home early, not come back until Jan 12th. Key-phrase: was supposed to be
The More You Know: Strong NKS has an ontological incommensurability problem. Who knew?
Fuck you, snow. Both the precipitation and the rapper.
